main event: Three witnesses observed a bright object with a shimmering tail in Medway, Ohio, on June 10, 1966.
interesting points: The object was in sight for about 10 minutes,The witnesses described the object as appearing to move at high speed,The object seemed to accelerate quickly,Two distinct light sources were seen moving together,One witness noted that the object appeared similar to a bright light with a tail.
sighted object: a bright light with a shimmering tail
witness description: three witnesses including a former Air Force service member
